    Plot Mercedes Price

    plot_mercedes_price.Rd

    Plot a density plot of a specific Mercedes-Benz model to see where the current vehicle's price falls within the distribution of prices for that model in the market.

    plot_mercedes_price(
  model,
  price,
  market_df,
  model_col = "model",
  price_col = "price_USD"
)

    Arguments

    model

    character The model of the vehicle.

    price

    numeric The price of the vehicle.

    market_df

    data.frame Data containing information on used Mercedes-Benz in the market.

    model_col

    character The name of the column of model. (By default 'model')

    price_col

    character The name of the column of price. (By default 'price_USD')

    Value

    ggplot Density plot of prices for the specified Mercedes-Benz model.

    Examples

    data <- as.double(sample(10000:500000, 1000, replace = TRUE))
market_df <- data.frame(price_USD = data, model = "glb 35")
plot_mercedes_price('glb 35', 200000, market_df)
